Title: Problem Solving Diploma
Description: Build strong problem-solving and logical thinking skills through real coding challenges. Learn to design efficient algorithms and apply structured thinking to solve real-world software problems.

Title: Advanced Frontend Diploma
Description: Master modern frontend development with Angular and React. Learn performance optimization, state management, and build scalable, accessible user interfaces for professional web apps.

Title: Advanced Backend Diploma
Description: Learn backend engineering with .NET Core, SOLID principles, and clean architecture. Master API design, database optimization, and caching for building secure, high-performance systems.
